title: Financial capital flows to higher British i rate

content.question: The equilibrium real interest rate in Britain increases to 8 percent while the equilibrium real interest rate in Australia remains at 4 percent. As a result, financial capital will flow from

choices.label: Britain to Australia, increasing the interest rate in Britain and decreasing the interest rate in Australia
Britain to Australia, decreasing the interest rate in Britain and increasing the interest rate in Australia
Australia to Britain, increasing the interest rate in Britain and decreasing the interest rate in Australia
Australia to Britain, decreasing the interest rate in Britain and decreasing the interest rate in Australia
Australia to Britain, decreasing the interest rate in Britain and increasing the interest rate in Australia

content.answer: Australia to Britain, decreasing the interest rate in Britain and increasing the interest rate in Australia

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
